<xf:macro name="head" arg-app="!">
	<xf:set var="$faVer">4.7.0</xf:set>
	<xf:set var="$cssUrls" value="{{ ['public:normalize.css', 'public:core.less', $app . ':app.less'] }}" />

	<xf:if is="$xf.options.fontAwesomeSource == 'local'">
		<xf:set var="$cssUrls" value="{{ array_merge($cssUrls, ['public:font_awesome.css']) }}" />
		<link rel="preload" href="{{ base_url('styles/fonts/fa/fontawesome-webfont.woff2?v=' . $faVer) }}" as="font" type="font/woff2" crossorigin="anonymous" />
	</xf:if>

	<link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ css_url($cssUrls) }}" />

	<xf:if is="$xf.options.fontAwesomeSource != 'local'">
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/{$faVer}/css/font-awesome.min.css" />
	</xf:if>
	<!--XF:CSS-->
	<xf:if is="$xf.fullJs">
		<script src="{{ js_url('vendor/modernizr/modernizr.min.js') }}"></script>
		<script src="{{ js_url('xf/preamble.js') }}"></script>
	<xf:else />
		<script src="{{ js_url('xf/preamble-compiled.js') }}"></script>
	</xf:if>
	<script>
		var xfhtml = document.getElementById('XF');
		function addClass(el, className) { if (el.classList) el.classList.add(className); else if (!hasClass(el, className)) el.className += ' ' + className; }
		function getCookie(name) { var v = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + name + '=([^;]*)(;|$)'); return v ? v[2] : null; }
		function setCookie(name, value, days) { var d = new Date; d.setTime(d.getTime() + 24*60*60*1000*days); document.cookie = name + "=" + value + ";path=/;expires=" + d.toGMTString(); }
		function deleteCookie(name) { setCookie(name, '', -1); }
		var backgroundCookie = getCookie('hirqizStyle');
		if(backgroundCookie){ xfhtml.setAttribute('hirqiz-style', '' + backgroundCookie + '');	} else { xfhtml.setAttribute('hirqiz-style', "1"); }
		var expandCookie = getCookie('expandState');
		if(expandCookie){ xfhtml.setAttribute('expand-state', '' + expandCookie + '');	} else { xfhtml.setAttribute('expand-state', "expand"); }
		var sidebarCookie = getCookie('sidebarState');
		if(sidebarCookie){ xfhtml.setAttribute('sidebar-state', '' + sidebarCookie + '');	} else { xfhtml.setAttribute('sidebar-state', "collapse"); }
		var hirqizFlip = getCookie('hirqizFlip');
		if(hirqizFlip){ xfhtml.setAttribute('hirqiz-flip', '' + hirqizFlip + '');	} else { xfhtml.setAttribute('hirqiz-flip', "flip"); }
		var hirqizDarkAdjust = getCookie('hirqizDarkAdjust');
		if(hirqizDarkAdjust){ xfhtml.setAttribute('hirqiz-dark-adjust', '' + hirqizDarkAdjust + '');	} else { xfhtml.setAttribute('hirqiz-dark-adjust', "normal"); }
	</script>

	<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles')">
		<script src="{{ js_url('hirqiztema/particles.min.js') }}"></script>
	</xf:if>

	<script>
		var r_text = new Array ();
		r_text[0] = "\"{$xf.options.HirqizSozler_1|raw}\"";
		r_text[1] = "\"{$xf.options.HirqizSozler_2|raw}\"";
		r_text[2] = "\"{$xf.options.HirqizSozler_3|raw}\"";
		r_text[3] = "\"{$xf.options.HirqizSozler_4|raw}\"";
		r_text[4] = "\"{$xf.options.HirqizSozler_5|raw}\"";
		r_text[5] = "\"{$xf.options.HirqizSozler_6|raw}\"";
		r_text[6] = "\"{$xf.options.HirqizSozler_7|raw}\"";
		var i = Math.floor(7*Math.random())
	</script>
</xf:macro>

<xf:macro name="body" arg-app="!" arg-jsState="{{ null }}">
	<xf:corejs />
	<!--XF:JS-->
	<script>
		jQuery.extend(true, XF.config, {
			// <!--[XF:js_global:xf_extend_start]-->
			userId: {$xf.visitor.user_id},
			url: {
				fullBase: '{{ base_url(null, true)|escape("js") }}',
				basePath: '{{ base_url(null, false)|escape("js") }}',
				css: '{{ css_url(["__SENTINEL__"], false)|escape("js") }}',
				keepAlive: '{{ link_type($app, "login/keep-alive")|escape("js") }}'
			},
			cookie: {
				path: '{{ $xf.cookie.path|escape("js") }}',
				domain: '{{ $xf.cookie.domain|escape("js") }}',
				prefix: '{{ $xf.cookie.prefix|escape("js") }}',
				secure: {{ $xf.cookie.secure ? 'true' : 'false' }}
			},
			csrf: '{{ csrf_token()|escape("js") }}',
			js: {'<!--XF:JS:JSON-->'},
			css: {'<!--XF:CSS:JSON-->'},
			time: {
				now: {$xf.time},
				today: {$xf.timeDetails.today},
				todayDow: {$xf.timeDetails.todayDow}
			},
			borderSizeFeature: '{{ property('borderSizeFeature') }}',
			enableRtnProtect: {{ $xf.enableRtnProtect ? 'true' : 'false' }},
			enableFormSubmitSticky: {{ property('formSubmitSticky') ? 'true' : 'false' }},
			uploadMaxFilesize: {$xf.uploadMaxFilesize},
			visitorCounts: {
				conversations_unread: '{$xf.visitor.conversations_unread|number}',
				alerts_unread: '{$xf.visitor.alerts_unread|number}',
				total_unread: '{{ ($xf.visitor.conversations_unread + $xf.visitor.alerts_unread)|number }}',
				title_count: {{ in_array($xf.options.displayVisitorCount, ['title_count', 'title_and_icon']) ? 'true' : 'false' }},
				icon_indicator: {{ in_array($xf.options.displayVisitorCount, ['icon_indicator', 'title_and_icon']) ? 'true' : 'false' }}
			},
			jsState: {{ $jsState ? $jsState|json|raw : '{}' }}
		});

		jQuery.extend(XF.phrases, {
			// <!--[XF:js_global:xf_phrase_start]-->
			date_x_at_time_y: "{{ phrase('date_x_at_time_y')|escape('js') }}",
			day_x_at_time_y:  "{{ phrase('day_x_at_time_y')|escape('js') }}",
			yesterday_at_x:   "{{ phrase('yesterday_at_x')|escape('js') }}",
			x_minutes_ago:    "{{ phrase('x_minutes_ago')|escape('js') }}",
			one_minute_ago:   "{{ phrase('one_minute_ago')|escape('js') }}",
			a_moment_ago:     "{{ phrase('a_moment_ago')|escape('js') }}",
			today_at_x:       "{{ phrase('today_at_x')|escape('js') }}",
			in_a_moment:      "{{ phrase('in_a_moment')|escape('js') }}",
			in_a_minute:      "{{ phrase('in_a_minute')|escape('js') }}",
			in_x_minutes:     "{{ phrase('in_x_minutes')|escape('js') }}",
			later_today_at_x: "{{ phrase('later_today_at_x')|escape('js') }}",
			tomorrow_at_x:    "{{ phrase('tomorrow_at_x')|escape('js') }}",

			day0: "{{ phrase('day_sunday')|escape('js') }}",
			day1: "{{ phrase('day_monday')|escape('js') }}",
			day2: "{{ phrase('day_tuesday')|escape('js') }}",
			day3: "{{ phrase('day_wednesday')|escape('js') }}",
			day4: "{{ phrase('day_thursday')|escape('js') }}",
			day5: "{{ phrase('day_friday')|escape('js') }}",
			day6: "{{ phrase('day_saturday')|escape('js') }}",

			dayShort0: "{{ phrase('day_sunday_short')|escape('js') }}",
			dayShort1: "{{ phrase('day_monday_short')|escape('js') }}",
			dayShort2: "{{ phrase('day_tuesday_short')|escape('js') }}",
			dayShort3: "{{ phrase('day_wednesday_short')|escape('js') }}",
			dayShort4: "{{ phrase('day_thursday_short')|escape('js') }}",
			dayShort5: "{{ phrase('day_friday_short')|escape('js') }}",
			dayShort6: "{{ phrase('day_saturday_short')|escape('js') }}",

			month0: "{{ phrase('month_1')|escape('js') }}",
			month1: "{{ phrase('month_2')|escape('js') }}",
			month2: "{{ phrase('month_3')|escape('js') }}",
			month3: "{{ phrase('month_4')|escape('js') }}",
			month4: "{{ phrase('month_5')|escape('js') }}",
			month5: "{{ phrase('month_6')|escape('js') }}",
			month6: "{{ phrase('month_7')|escape('js') }}",
			month7: "{{ phrase('month_8')|escape('js') }}",
			month8: "{{ phrase('month_9')|escape('js') }}",
			month9: "{{ phrase('month_10')|escape('js') }}",
			month10: "{{ phrase('month_11')|escape('js') }}",
			month11: "{{ phrase('month_12')|escape('js') }}",

			active_user_changed_reload_page: "{{ phrase('active_user_changed_reload_page')|escape('js') }}",
			server_did_not_respond_in_time_try_again: "{{ phrase('server_did_not_respond_in_time_try_again')|escape('js') }}",
			oops_we_ran_into_some_problems: "{{ phrase('oops_we_ran_into_some_problems')|escape('js') }}",
			oops_we_ran_into_some_problems_more_details_console: "{{ phrase('oops_we_ran_into_some_problems_more_details_console')|escape('js') }}",
			file_too_large_to_upload: "{{ phrase('file_too_large_to_upload')|escape('js') }}",
			uploaded_file_is_too_large_for_server_to_process: "{{ phrase('uploaded_file_is_too_large_for_server_to_process')|escape('js') }}",
			files_being_uploaded_are_you_sure: "{{ phrase('files_being_uploaded_are_you_sure')|escape('js') }}",
			attach: "{{ phrase('button.attach')|escape('js') }}",
			rich_text_box: "{{ phrase('rich_text_box')|escape('js') }}",
			close: "{{ phrase('close')|escape('js') }}",

			showing_x_of_y_items: "{{ phrase('showing_x_of_y_items')|escape('js') }}",
			showing_all_items: "{{ phrase('showing_all_items')|escape('js') }}",
			no_items_to_display: "{{ phrase('no_items_to_display')|escape('js') }}"
		});
	</script>
	
	<script>
		$(document).ready(function(){
			var html = $('#XF');
			
			$(".theme-switch").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var backgroundClass = $(this).attr("hirqiz-style");
				html.attr('hirqiz-style', '' + backgroundClass + '');
				setCookie('hirqizStyle', '' + backgroundClass + '', 30);
			});
			
			$("a.hirqiz-resize-toggle.open").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var expandState = $(this).attr("expand-state");
				html.attr('expand-state', '' + expandState + '');
				setCookie('expandState', '' + expandState + '', 30);
			});
			$("a.hirqiz-resize-toggle.close").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var expandState = $(this).attr("expand-state");
				html.attr('expand-state', '' + expandState + '');
				setCookie('expandState', '' + expandState + '', 30);
			});
			
			$("a.hirqiz-sidebar-toggle.open").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var sidebarState = $(this).attr("sidebar-state");
				html.attr('sidebar-state', '' + sidebarState + '');
				setCookie('sidebarState', '' + sidebarState + '', 30);
			});
			$("a.hirqiz-sidebar-toggle.close").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var sidebarState = $(this).attr("sidebar-state");
				html.attr('sidebar-state', '' + sidebarState + '');
				setCookie('sidebarState', '' + sidebarState + '', 30);
			});

			$("a.hirqiz-flip-toggle.flip").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var hirqizFlip = $(this).attr("hirqiz-flip");
				html.attr('hirqiz-flip', '' + hirqizFlip + '');
				setCookie('hirqizFlip', '' + hirqizFlip + '', 30);
			});
			$("a.hirqiz-flip-toggle.flipped").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var hirqizFlip = $(this).attr("hirqiz-flip");
				html.attr('hirqiz-flip', '' + hirqizFlip + '');
				setCookie('hirqizFlip', '' + hirqizFlip + '', 30);
			});

			$("a.hirqiz-dark-adjust.normal").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var hirqizDarkAdjust = $(this).attr("hirqiz-dark-adjust");
				html.attr('hirqiz-dark-adjust', '' + hirqizDarkAdjust + '');
				setCookie('hirqizDarkAdjust', '' + hirqizDarkAdjust + '', 30);
			});
			$("a.hirqiz-dark-adjust.amoled").on('click', function(){
				var styleid = html.attr('style-id');
				var hirqizDarkAdjust = $(this).attr("hirqiz-dark-adjust");
				html.attr('hirqiz-dark-adjust', '' + hirqizDarkAdjust + '');
				setCookie('hirqizDarkAdjust', '' + hirqizDarkAdjust + '', 30);
			});
		});
	</script>

	<xf:if is="property('hirqizPosts_slidingBG')">
		<script>
			var hirqiz_sliding_background = $(".hirqizPosts");
			$(window).scroll(function() {
				hirqiz_sliding_background.css('opacity', 1 - ($(window).scrollTop()) / hirqiz_sliding_background.height() / 1);
			});
		</script>
	</xf:if>

	<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles')">
		<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles_type') === 'circle'">
			<script>
				particlesJS.load('particles-js', '{{ js_url('hirqiztema/particlescircle.json') }}');
			</script>
		</xf:if>
		<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles_type') === 'edge'">
			<script>
				particlesJS.load('particles-js', '{{ js_url('hirqiztema/particlesedge.json') }}');
			</script>
		</xf:if>
		<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles_type') === 'triangle'">
			<script>
				particlesJS.load('particles-js', '{{ js_url('hirqiztema/particlestriangle.json') }}');
			</script>
		</xf:if>
		<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles_type') === 'polygon'">
			<script>
				particlesJS.load('particles-js', '{{ js_url('hirqiztema/particlespolygon.json') }}');
			</script>
		</xf:if>
		<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles_type') === 'star'">
			<script>
				particlesJS.load('particles-js', '{{ js_url('hirqiztema/particlesstar.json') }}');
			</script>
		</xf:if>
		<xf:if is="property('hirqiz_particles_type') === 'image'">
			<script>
				particlesJS.load('particles-js', '{{ js_url('hirqiztema/particlesimage.json') }}');
			</script>
		</xf:if>
	</xf:if>

	<form style="display:none" hidden="hidden">
		<input type="text" name="_xfClientLoadTime" value="" id="_xfClientLoadTime" title="_xfClientLoadTime" tabindex="-1" />
	</form>

	<xf:if is="$xf.visitor.canSearch() && $xf.request.getFullRequestUri() === link('full:index')">
		<script type="application/ld+json">
		{
			"@context": "https://schema.org",
			"@type": "WebSite",
			"url": "{{ link('canonical:index')|escape('js') }}",
			"potentialAction": {
				"@type": "SearchAction",
				"target": "{{ link('canonical:search/search')|escape('js') . ($xf.options.useFriendlyUrls ? '?' : '&') . 'keywords={search_keywords}' }}",
				"query-input": "required name=search_keywords"
			}
		}
		</script>
	</xf:if>
</xf:macro>

property.title: Block border framework
property.description: Virtually all blocks have their borders styled with these settings

property.title: Block filter bar
property.description: When the content of a block can be filtered, the controls to do so are styled here

property.title: Block footer
property.description: When information needs to be conveyed in a footer element for a block, its style is controlled here

property.title: Block header
property.description: Blocks often have title bars at their tops, which are styled here

property.title: Block minor header
property.description: Sub-headings in blocks use these settings

property.title: Block tab header
property.description: Occasionally, blocks will have multi-part, tab headers, styled with these settings

property.title: Block tab header - selected tab
property.description: The selected tab in multi-part headers takes additional styling from here

property.title: Button base
property.description: Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons

property.title: Button - call to action
property.description: Call to action buttons sit alone and invite the user to do something, like post a new thread

property.title: Button - default
property.description: Most buttons use this styling, except for primary form submit buttons

property.title: Button - primary
property.description: These rules are used mostly for the main submit button for forms

property.title: User Interface Font
property.description: The font list for your main text
property.value: "\"Exo\",sans-serif,'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif"

property.title: Form submit row
property.description: At the bottom of most forms is a bar containing the submit button etc.

property.title: Header Proxy Görünümü
property.description: HirqizPosts ve header elementlerini barındıran kısım için özelleştirme sağlar.

property.title: Header Proxy Filtre
property.description: Hırqız Proxy üzerine çekilen filtre ve animasyonların kontrolünü sağlar.

property.title: Header Proxy Filtre Saydamlığı
property.description: Header Proxy filtre saydamlık oranı kontrolü

property.description: Hirqiz Footer için özelleştirme sağlar.

property.description: HirqizPosts arkaplanı için özelleştirme sağlar.

property.description: HirqizPosts başlığı için özelleştirme sağlar.

property.title: HirqizPosts Resim Filtresi
property.description: HirqizPosts içerisindeki 3 konu üzerine çekilen filtrenin ve animasyonların kontrolünü sağlar.

Oval Proxy Ovallik Yüzdesi (İçten Dışa)
property.description: Oval Proxy Ovallik Yüzdesi (İçten Dışa)

property.description: Oval Proxy Ovallik Yüzdesi (Dıştan İçe)

property.title: Hirqiz Ziyaretçi Mesajı Arkaplan
property.description: Hirqiz Tema ziyaretçi davet mesajı bloğunun arkaplan kontrolünü sağlar.

property.title: Hirqiz Ziyaretçi Mesajı Yazı Görünümü
property.description: Hirqiz Tema ziyaretçi davet mesajı bloğunda bulunan davet mesajı yazısının kontrolünü sağlar.

property.description: Hirqiz Tema ziyaretçi davet mesajı bloğu başlığının kontrolünü sağlar.

property.title: Particles Tipi
property.value_parameters: circle=Yuvarlak edge=Kare triangle=Üçgen polygon=Çokgen star=Yıldız image=Resim (js/hirqiztema içerisinden düzenleyebilirsiniz)

property.title: Mobil Görünümde Hırqız Haberlerin Akış Animasyonları
property.value_parameters: fade=Solma left=Silikleşme top=Yukarı Kayma bottom=Aşağı Kayma right=Sağa Kayma left=Sola Kayma zoom=Yakınlaşma

property.title: Yapışkan Header Arkaplan Rengi
property.description: Sabit header arkaplan rengi kontrolü.

property.title: Yapışkan Header Arkaplan Resmi
property.description: Sabit header arkaplan resim kontrolü.

property.title: Form input
property.description: Controls the style of most text-input boxes

property.title: Form input - focused
property.description: These rules are applied to text boxes when they are selected for input

property.title: Member profile header
property.description: The member profile page's content header is styled with these settings

property.title: Menu header
property.description: Most menus identify themselves with a header just underneath their top border

property.title: Message user info elements
property.description: The elements selected here will be displayed in the message user info block. It will not be displayed below the single column width.

property.title: Description display style
property.description: To save vertical space, it is possible to hide node descriptions until the node title is hovered, at which point they are displayed in a tooltip

property.title: Sub-forums display style
property.description: Choose the style in which sub-forums will be displayed within a particular node element, according to the amount of space you want them to occupy

property.title: Overlay header
property.description: Overlays use a header element to identify their contents, styled here

property.title: Page background
property.description: The page background, behind all block elements, uses the styling rules defined here

property.title: Page edge spacer
property.description: All elements will be spaced at least this far from the edges of the page

property.title: Maximum page width
property.description: As the window is resized, it will continue to grow in width until this value, after which it will remain static

property.title: Favicon URL (32x32)
property.description: Path to the small logo that is associated with bookmarks pointing to your site

property.title: Header/logo row
property.description: The header row contains your logo and sits at the top of every public page

property.title: Logo URL
property.description: The web path from your site's XenForo installation directory to your logo image.

property.title: Navigation row
property.description: The navigation row sits below the header and contains the primary site navigation tabs and menus

property.title: Navigation row - selected tab
property.description: Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when they are selected

property.title: Navigation row - tab
property.description: Controls the styling of individual tab elements within the navigation row

property.title: Navigation row - hovered tab
property.description: Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when the pointer hovers over them

property.title: Staff tools bar
property.description: Visible only to staff, the staff tools bar sits above the header and contains items such as reported content, the moderation queue...

property.description: Eğer ek olarak temaya uyum sağlamasını istediğiniz elementler varsa buraya css kodlarını ekleyebilirsiniz.
